# misha

The misha package is intended to help users to efficiently analyze genomic data achieved from various experiments.

## Installation
```{r, eval=FALSE}
install.packages('misha', repos=c(getOption('repos'), 'https://tanaylab.bitbucket.io/repo'))
```
